This file decribes all islands in a complete NFP6000 and provides
names for CPP target IDs for presentation purposes.
While A0, B0 and C0 could all be lumped into one description here,
it's easier to separate them than to have lots of code checking if

EMEM._comment: size_max is from "base" in the resource, "allocbase" shrinks it

_comment: Large enough for max of VQDR. On NFP-6xxx "                          "this is always VQDR
Large enough for max of VQDR.
